nodes.text: A variant of Mandalorian armor was worn by the Imperial Super Commandos. Like regular Mandalorian armor, it was made of beskar alloy. It was normally white, reminiscent of stormtrooper armor. However, it could be highlighted with various colors to denote status: Gar Saxon, as the Imperial Viceroy of Mandalore, added red paint; and Tristan Wren, while a member of the Imperial Super Commandos, had yellow shoulder tips.
